Package tdi :: Package tools
[frames] | no frames]

Package tools

source code

TDI tools

This package contains tools which are supposed to make the practical template handling even more easy.

Author: André Malo

Submodules
  • tdi.tools._util: Tool Utilities.
  • tdi.tools.css: CSS Tools.
  • tdi.tools.escape: This module is deprecated and going to be removed.
  • tdi.tools.html: HTML Tools.
  • tdi.tools.htmlform: HTMLForm abstraction.
    • tdi.tools.htmlform._adapters: Form helper classes.
    • tdi.tools.htmlform._interfaces: Form helper classes.
    • tdi.tools.htmlform._main: Form helper classes.
    • tdi.tools.htmlform._processors: HTML form processors.
  • tdi.tools.javascript: Javascript Tools.
  • tdi.tools.rcssmin: CSS Minifier.
  • tdi.tools.rjsmin: rJSmin is a javascript minifier written in python.
  • tdi.tools.template: Template Tools.
